# one\_to\_many.gd

## Method Descriptions

### size

```gdscript
func size(one = null)
```

return the size of _items or the size of an element in _items if "one" was
specified.

### add

```gdscript
func add(one, many_item)
```

Add an element to "one" if it does not already exist

### clear

```gdscript
func clear()
```

### has

```gdscript
func has(one, many_item)
```

func to_s()
